variants.Description in input context: <Description of the variant from the literature>

Material used.Description: <Details about the material used in the experiment>

Experiment Method.Readout type: <Type of readout, e.g., quantitative, semi-quantitative, qualitative>

Readout description.Conclusion: <Conclusion based on the results for the variant, e.g., Abnormal/Normal>
Readout description.Molecular Effect: <Effect of the variant on the protein, if mentioned in the literature>
Readout description.Result Description: <Description of the experimental result for the variant>

Biological replicates.Biological replicates: <Number of biological replicates performed or Yes/No>
Biological replicates.Description: <Details about the biological replicates, if mentioned in the literature>

Technical replicates.Technical replicates: <Number of technical replicates performed or Yes/No>
Technical replicates.Description: <Details about the technical replicates, if mentioned in the literature>

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: <Whether a basic positive control was used or not>
Basic positive control.Description: <Details about the positive control, if mentioned in the literature>

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: <Whether a basic negative control was used or not>
Basic negative control.Description: <Details about the negative control, if mentioned in the literature>

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: <Whether pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants were validated or not>
Validation controls P/LP.Counts: <Number of validation controls for pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants>

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: <Whether benign/likely benign variants were validated or not>
Validation controls B/LB.Counts: <Number of validation controls for benign/likely benign variants>

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: <Name of the statistical analysis method used in the experiment>

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: <Threshold for a normal result, if mentioned in the literature>

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: <Threshold for an abnormal result, if mentioned in the literature>

Approved assay.Approved assay: <Whether the experimental method is generally used for studying this disease>
